title: Tycoon
description: Scott Colton. Wolf of Wall Street. King of the Boardroom. My Boss.I hated him the moment I met him. And he didnâ€™t even give me a second glance.Yet, he still hired me. He thought I was there to submit to his every whim.I knew better. I knew his secrets, his skeletons in the closet. And I was going to expose every single one of them.Then the rules changed. And everything was in disarray. Suddenly I realized that the Scott Colton I thought I knew was just a myth. The real Scott Colton was someone, even I, had underestimated.
author: J.S. Cooper
